data_descriptor.name: office_arrival_time
data_descriptor.description: Office arrival time (entering time into the office location) according to gps location model

data_descriptor.name: verdict
data_descriptor.description: Analysis of the arrival time which is one of the three verdict: 1. before_expected_liberal_time 2. after_expected_liberal_time 3. in_expected_liberal_time. Expected liberal time is the after_hour time of average arrival time. For example if average arrival time is 8:15 then expected liberal time is 8:30 on the other hand if average arrival time is 8:37 then expected liberal time is 9:00. The arrival time which are earlier than expected liberal time are labeled before_expected_liberal_time and the arrival time which are later than expected liberal time are labeled as after_expected_liberal_time, the arrival time which are exactly same as the expected liberal time are labeled as in_expected_liberal_time.

data_descriptor.name: deviation
data_descriptor.description: How much deviated from the expected liberal time (in minutes).

algorithm.description: Expected liberal office arrival time with verdict of before, after or in expected liberal arrival time. If 9:15 is the actual arrival time then 9:30 is the expected liberal arrival time. Sample is a list with three elements as follows: 0 - Office arrival time, 1 - verdict (after_expected_liberal_time, before_expected_liberal_time, in_expected_liberal_time), 2 - deviation from the expected liberal time in minutes.
